Matilde still can not adapt to her new life and she feels uncomfortable, she believes that she does not deserve what Roberto gives her.

119.title: Episode #1.119

Hernán goes out with Martin to have a drink, tells him that he is excited because he will soon be able to return to work and thus help Fernanda with the expenses of the house, Martín confesses that he became jealous the day he saw Julián with Vanesa and feels confused because, although he loves Mireya, he can not stop thinking about Vanesa.

121.title: Episode #1.121
121.plot: Fernanda and Irma have to endure the treatment of their new boss and their workplace, as it is completely different from what they were used to. Matilde takes Vanesa to the television station, they have an appointment with Octavio. Mireya, seeing Vanesa arrive is tense, but tries to disguise.

122.title: Episode #1.122
122.plot: Paulina is excited to see her friends again, because what has just happened to her dad, needs someone to trust and is relieved to see Vanesa because she knows she can receive advice from her. Danny feels more and more in love with Betty and does not lose opportunity. Martín is determined to investigate what is happening with Ariel.

123.title: Episode #1.123
123.plot: Martín and Hernán chase Ariel, Martín is determined to investigate what is happening to him. Hernán tries to stop Martín, but Martín does not understand and insists on entering. The dealer is willing to kill Martin, Ariel does not know what to do, but at that moment the police come in to help them.

124.title: Episode #1.124
124.plot: The dealer has Martín and Hernán threatened with a weapon. The dealer is willing to kill Martin, Ariel does not know what to do. A phone rings and the dealer releases a shot, but this one, by the nerves, shoots crook, at that moment the police come in to help them, everyone is shocked and the dealer does not know what to do.

125.title: Episode #1.125
125.plot: Delia arrives at Lupe's party and asks her mother what she's doing there, she ignores the question, Delia tells her how to get together with that kind of people, but her mother is still carefree. Lupe snatches the microphone and asks him not to insult anyone, to leave them alone, Delia does not shut up, Lupe insults her by saying 'Old witch'.

126.title: Episode #1.126
126.plot: Matilde claims Roberto about her lover, he does not know what to do. Delia is willing to separate Roberto from Matilde, asks Susiflor to pretend to be a reporter, and to tell her that Roberto went to a hotel.

127.title: Episode #1.127
127.plot: Matilde asks Roberto if he comes from being with his lover Silvia Longoria, he does not know what to do and she slaps him. Matilde goes to the hotel and surprises Roberto in bed.

128.title: Episode #1.128
128.plot: Matilde goes to look for Roberto in the hotel room, when Silvia opens the door Matilde is surprised to see Roberto lying on the bed, Matilde gives Silvia a blow and she goes crying. Mariano goes to his house for more things but Adrián and Placido prevent him.

129.title: Episode #1.129
129.plot: Delia is willing to make Vanesa pay for crossing her path. Delia gets angry with Consuelo because she tells him that she is jealous of Vanesa, Delia tells her that she is willing to make Vanesa pay for having crossed her path. Mireya and Octavio are talking, Octavio begins to kiss the neck gently, they begin to kiss passionately, so they ignite the flame of desire and passion.

130.title: Episode #1.130
130.plot: Fernanda is arrested for the death of Emmanuel. Fernanda cries because she does not know what happened to her daughter, hugs her and takes her by the hand, meanwhile in the public ministry they review what happened, they arrest Fernanda for presumed guilt of the death of Emmanuel. Fernanda cries behind bars disconsolate without knowing what to do.

131.title: Episode #1.131
131.plot: Delia meets Arreola in a restaurant, she complains about not doing well because she is going to broadcast again 'Word of a woman', he denies that the show is going to go on air, Delia humiliates him giving her money for pay the bill, Arreola tells him that that is not going to stay that way. Fernanda is in prison talking with one of the inmates, she tells him that she hopes that Emmanuel is paying for all the damage he did to them.

132.title: Episode #1.132
132.plot: Mariano sold Paulina's computer to get money, so she is disappointed and even though he is her father, she runs from the house and tells him that she does not want to hear from him again. Arreola goes to visit Delia's mother to tell her how she feels about her daughter, Consuelo tells her not to be a fool, nor a rogue, but above all that she does not allow herself to be humiliated by Delia even though he loves her, he is surprised by what she says. says Consuelo and does not know what to do or what to say.

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Adrián realizes that Mariano is stealing Paulina when he goes to visit her, he does not know what to do and only looks down, Adrián can not believe what he is seeing. Matilde goes to talk with Roberto about the divorce, when entering his office he realizes that he is with Silvia, Matilde leaves angry while Roberto shouts at her to wait, she ignores him.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: Consuelo a companion to Roberto to see Matilde's lawyer, the lawyer explains how the procedure is, Consuelo does not want Roberto to sign, so he asks her to think about it, but he does not listen to reasons and decides to sign.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot: Consuelo a companion to Roberto to see Matilde's lawyer, the lawyer explains how the procedure is, Consuelo does not want Roberto to sign, so he asks her to think about it, but he does not listen to reasons and decides to sign. A judge is going to visit Delia to tell her that Vanesa is pointing her out as suspicious of what happened to the production house, Delia is indifferent about the accusation.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Adrián makes the decision to leave Paulina, Placido asks him what he does, he replies that he goes very far. Paulina and Octavio are in a restaurant, she is not happy, while he gives her flowers and tells her that she looks beautiful. Consuelo arrives at her house and sees Delia lying on the floor, she worries and does not know what to do.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot: Paulina looks for Adrián, takes a microphone and tells her that she has already made a decision, that she spoke with Octavio and told her that she only wants to be with the person she really loves and that person is Adrián. Fernanda is listening to the final verdict on the subject of the death of Emmanuel, the secretary declares Fernanda as guilty, she can not believe it and begins to mourn inconsolable.

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot: Matilde and Roberto are about to sign their divorce, both are undecided, at the moment when the judge asks them to sign the two they turn to see without being able to hide their pain. Mireya is doing some DNA studies to find out if the baby she waits for is Martín, when he arrives at his house to see the results, he realizes that he is not his son, he is surprised and Martín notices him, so She asks what's wrong, but she does not say anything.

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot: Silvia talks with Matilde to tell her the truth about Roberto, she confesses that he was never unfaithful, that everything is her fault and that Roberto only feels contempt for her, Matilde does not know what to do or what to say. Paulina finds the results of Mireya's pregnancy studies, reads them and tells Vanesa that the son Mireya expects is not from Martin, she can not believe it.

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Delia is alone and sad at home, when she reads the newspaper she realizes that Martín and Vanesa are getting married, she gets angry and breaks the newspaper. Vanesa and Martín are with the judge about to get married, Delia suddenly arrives to prevent the wedding, Martín and Vanesa are surprised, he kisses Delia and Vanesa is surprised.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: Adrián makes the decision to leave Paulina, Placido asks him what he does, he replies that he goes very far. Paulina and Octavio are in a restaurant, she is not happy, while he gives her flowers and tells her that she looks beautiful.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Paulina looks for Adrián, takes a microphone and tells her that she has already made a decision, that she spoke with Octavio and told her that she only wants to be with the person she really loves and that person is Adrián.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Fernanda is listening to the final verdict on the subject of the death of Emmanuel, the secretary declares Fernanda as guilty, she can not believe it and begins to mourn inconsolable.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: Mireya is doing some DNA studies to find out if the baby she waits for is Martín, when he arrives at his house to see the results, he realizes that he is not his son, he is surprised and Martín notices him, so She asks what's wrong, but she does not say anything.

145.title: Capitulo final
145.plot: Vanesa, Fernanda, Matilde and Paulina, had problems, misfortunes, love, lack of love, hatred and passion, throughout history. What will happen to the production house? Will the love between Vanesa and Martín defeat Delia? What will happen between Roberto and Matilde? Will Fernanda remain a single mother? Paulina and Adrián will they be able to be together at last? And what will Delia's outcome be?

imdb.title: Palabra de mujer
plot: It is the story of four women: Vanesa, Fernanda, Paulina and Matilde, who despite coming from different social fields, will undertake together an adventure that will lead them to be realized as professionals and friends.
